description: Listed Building Consent for the: 1) construction of first floor side and rear extension; 2) raise parapet wall, insertion of 2no.window openings at first floor level, replacement of existing window opening with French doors & sidelights, metal balustrade addition, creation of new upper ground floor door opening, replacement of timber garage doors with new single door to Front Elevation of Side Addition; 3) raise parapet wall, replacement of existing stair and lean-to with French doors, creation of new first floor window openings, modification of existing lower and upper ground floor windows, removal of glazed light above access door, new cast iron rainwater goods, alteration to existing screen wall, new render and decoration and replacement of existing concrete/metal stairs with new metal/timber terrace and stairs to Rear Elevation; 4) raise parapet wall, brick up top stair window opening, relocation of existing exposed drainage to Side Elevation (South); 5) raise parapet wall, removal of existing stairs and lean-to, brick up existing openings, provision of new caset iron rainwater goods and new render and decoration to Side Elevation (North); 6) Part infilling of garage door opening, provision of new wall, modification of rear window openings, infill openings, removal of existing timber steps, creation of new opening between new home office and garden rooms, installation of new WC and lowering of finished floor level to garden/office room by 200mm to Garage Store; 7) Relocation of flat entrance door, creation of new bathroom, relocation of bedroom 2 partition and bedroom doors and block up access to stairs to garage to Existing Flat 2; 8) Removal of stairs, kitchen, bathroom and bedroom, lowering of finished floor level by 210mm, replacement of front window with French doors, creation of new opening for front door and modification of rear window to Proposed Upper Ground Floor (above Garage Store); and 9) brick up existing stair window and insertion of roof light to rear elevation stairwell.
